short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to learn languages faster whenever you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn a new word every time you open a new tab.

We have compiled a list of common words in your favourite language along with their translations in English and with some simple to understand examples.

*********** FEATURES ************
▹ Random word on every tab open
▹ Word information such as "gender" and "plural" word
▹ Example for every word
▹ Free audio of the word and example
***********************************

You can contribute and add more translations in your own language by following the instructions in the Github repository (link in the extension header). We only support "German" language at the moment, but support for other languages such as "French" and "Spanish" is coming soon.
